name: Shift Kit | Options
description: There is almost always more than one option in every situation and taking the time to really explore more than is one of the most beneficial things in order to explore all the possibilities. Coming up with two options is easy, the 3rd can always be some hybrid of the first two, so it’s recommended to always try to find a 4th, which also helps ensure decision makers know you really thought through things. After you’ve created options, the next step is to come up a recommendation & next steps.
